introduction: Welcome to our longevity science platform, a comprehensive online resource designed to compile and classify open problems in aging research. Our goal is to facilitate collaboration and accelerate discoveries by providing a repository of unresolved questions and challenges in the field. Here, researchers can explore current issues, contribute findings, and engage with a global community dedicated to advancing our understanding of longevity.
problemButton: Explore our curated database of open problems in longevity science.
submitButton: Contribute by submitting new problems to broaden our collective understanding
aboutButton: Know the beginning of this project
contactButton: Tell us how could we improve your experience
categoryButton: Discover open problems organised by their underlying themes.
